statements: DELETE FROM network_traffic_logs WHERE id = 100 AND timestamp = '2022-01-01 12:00:00'
DELETE FROM network_traffic_logs WHERE source_ip = '192.168.1.1' AND protocol = 'TCP'
DELETE FROM network_traffic_logs WHERE log_id = 100 AND timestamp < '2022-01-01'
DELETE FROM analysis_logs WHERE analysis_id = 50 AND analysis_type = 'malware' AND analysis_timestamp > '2021-10-01'
DELETE FROM traffic_analysis WHERE log_id = (SELECT log_id FROM network_traffic_logs WHERE source_ip = '192.168.1.10')
DELETE FROM user_activities WHERE user_id = 100 AND activity_type = 'login';
DELETE FROM network_logs WHERE device_id = (SELECT device_id FROM network_devices WHERE location = 'Server Room') AND severity > 2;
